mapper.select: SELECT b.brand_id as brandId, b.brand_initial as brandInitial, b.brand_name as brandName, b.brand_description as brandDescription, s.series_id as seriesId, s.series_initial as seriesInitial, s.series_name as seriesName, s.type, m.model_id as modelId, m.sub_series as subSeries, m.model_name as modelName, m.displacement, m.transmission_type as transmissionType, m.launch_year as launchYear, m.driven_type as drivenType FROM brand b left join series s on s.brand_id = b.brand_id left join model m on m.series_id = s.series_id order by b.brand_initial
